price: 52. Daarna vergaven Wij jullie zodat jullie dankbaar zouden zijn.
arabic: ثُمَّ عَفَوۡنَا عَنكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma ʿafawnā ʿankum min baʿdi dhālika laʿallakum tashkurūna
